description: Details of condition 12 pursuant t planning permission reference 14/1886 dated 27/08/2014 for  Variation of condition 2 (approved plans) to allow for minor material amendments to the scheme including changes to window details and entrances on each elevation; alterations to roof to allow for lift overrun, infilling of recessed front bay area to provide further cold storage space and associated internal alterations of planning permission 12/1503 dated 28 June 2013 for demolition of existing building and erection of a new building comprising basement, ground, first and second floors for mixed employment uses (Use Classes B1, B2 and B8) with ancillary uses comprising customer cafe/marketplace, Training School with associated parking, landscaping and external works, and subject to a Deed of Agreement dated 25 th June 2013 under Section 106 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended and accompanied by plans or documents listed here: See Condition 2
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
